statements: INSERT INTO books (title, author, publish_date, category, tags, description) VALUES ('Harry Potter and the Sorcerer''s Stone', 'J.K. Rowling', '1997-06-26', 'Fantasy', ARRAY['magic', 'adventure'], 'The first book in the Harry Potter series.')

INSERT INTO books (title, author, publish_date, category, tags, description) VALUES ('To Kill a Mockingbird', 'Harper Lee', '1960-07-11', 'Fiction', ARRAY['classic', 'social issues'], 'A powerful story dealing with racial injustice.')

INSERT INTO books (author, title, category, description, publish_date, tags) VALUES ('George Orwell', '1984', 'Dystopian', 'A dystopian novel portraying a totalitarian society.', '1949-06-08', ARRAY['surveillance', 'government'])
